stops.description: The path to the .yml config file for stops.

lines.description: The path to the .yml config file for lines.

urlNames.description: The path to the .yml config file for url names.

continuation.description: The path to the .yml config file for continunation.

usePlatforms.description: True if stops should list their platforms. Enables platform filtering.

timezone.description: The timezone the transit system's timetables use.

offset.description: E.g. '10' for AEST, or '11' for AEDT.

offsetCheckHour.description: Which hour of the day to use when checking the offset, since DST doesn't start at midnight.

serviceTypes.description: Array of all possible service types, e.g. [suburban, regional].

timetables.description: The path/glob to the .ttbl files to use as static timetables.

platformRules.description: The path to the .yml config file for platform guessing rules.

gtfs.description: The path to the .yml config file for GTFS setup.

linter.description: The path to the .yml config file for linter rules.

about.description: The path to the .md file for the about page content.

beta.description: True to show 'BETA' next to the app name. Default: false.

tagline.description: Used on the homepage, e.g. 'Navigate Melbourne's train network'.

footer.description: Raw HTML string with copyright info and disclaimers visible in the footer.

metaDescription.description: Used in the SEO description, e.g. 'Navigate Melbourne's train network with TrainQuery'.

departureFeeds.description: The path to the .yml config file for departure feeds.

via.description: Rules describing when to show 'via ___' on a departure.

text.description: The text to show, e.g. 'via City Loop'.

rules.description: The rule, e.g. 'direction-down line-10, direction-down line-9' which would match any train on line 9 or 10 going in a 'down' direction.

directionNames.description: Strings to use on the frontend, e.g. 'citybound' for up.

additionalProperties.description: Strings to use on the frontend, e.g. 'citybound' for up.
